traffic_accident::text_card_2::text: Shoot more clips as needed. When you are finished, arrange your clips below with the Order button, and click Publish to upload.
traffic_accident::clip_card_2::goals[1]: Show a close up detail of the accident, broken glass, a torn door, some result of the accident.
traffic_accident::clip_card_2::goals[0]: Show a detail of the accident, broken glass, a torn door, etc.
traffic_accident::text_card_0::text: Next interview those nearby. Be sure you, and the people around you, are safe before you start this section of your story.
traffic_accident::clip_card_3::goals[0]: Show someone responding to the accident.
traffic_accident::clip_card_0::goals[0]: Show the place the accident happened.
traffic_accident::intro_card_0::headline: See a Traffic Accident? Report it!
traffic_accident::clip_card_4::goals[0]: Ask- How you see the accident? How did it happen?
traffic_accident::text_card_1::text: Duplicate the cards above and interview as many people as you need. Try to speak with a witness or someone from emergency services.
traffic_accident::clip_card_1::goals[0]: Show the action happening around the accident.
traffic_accident::title: See a Traffic Accident?
